column4: sudo apt-get dist-upgrade is a in the release upgrade not to another release.

personally I would say don't upgrade to another release without having your stuff backup but here is the info. http://askubuntu.com/questions/125392/why-is-no-new-release-found-when-upgrading-10-04-to-12-04-lts
have you seen 12.04 it has a completely different desktop.
it is trying to upgrade to maverick, make a thread at the ubuntu forums it will probably be helpfel, this channel is much busier daytime US
